patch 8.0.0597: off-by-one error in size computation

Problem:    Off-by-one error in buffer size computation.
Solution:   Use ">=" instead of ">". (Lemonboy, closes #1694)

patch 8.0.0597: off-by-one error in size computation

Problem:    Off-by-one error in buffer size computation.
Solution:   Use ">=" instead of ">". (Lemonboy, closes #1694)
